ShowDevelopMenu.title: Show Develop Menu
ShowDevelopMenu.description: If enabled, displays the 'Develop' menu bar item (Preferences > Advanced > Show Develop).

AlwaysPromptForDownloadFolder.title: Always Prompt For Download Folder
AlwaysPromptForDownloadFolder.description: If enabled, sets 'File download location' to 'Ask for each download' (Settings > General).
